paragraphs.content: The Receiving Parties intend to {{ purpose }} (the "**Permitted Purpose**").

In connection with the Permitted Purpose, the Disclosing Party has disclosed or made available, and may (further) disclose or make available, certain confidential and/or proprietary business, financial, technical, or other information to the Receiving Parties that the Disclosing Party desires the Receiving Parties to treat as confidential.
This unilateral non-disclosure agreement (the "**Agreement**") sets out the terms and conditions under which such information is provided.
